\hypertarget{namespacegft_1_1CImage}{}\doxysection{gft\+::C\+Image Namespace Reference}
\label{namespacegft_1_1CImage}\index{gft::CImage@{gft::CImage}}


Common definitions and functions to manipulate a color image, providing three samples (color channels) for each pixel.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Common definitions and functions to manipulate a color image, providing three samples (color channels) for each pixel.

Changes an image from R\+GB to grayscale. 

The luminosity method works best overall and is the default method used if you ask G\+I\+MP to change an image from R\+GB to grayscale \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacegft_1_1CImage_ae57252a1828596f470c0740a860bc5ab}\label{namespacegft_1_1CImage_ae57252a1828596f470c0740a860bc5ab}}
